title: A 7%-Yielding Dividend Stock That Could Still Rise In August
text: If you're looking for massive cash creators carrying big yields, you could do a lot worse than to take a look at this top income stock.

title: U.S. stock futures point to rebound for battered equities
text: U.S. stock futures pushed higher early Thursday, a day after the Dow Jones Industrial Average posted its worst one-day point loss of the year on growing fears of a global economic slowdown.

title: 30-year Treasury yield falls below 2% for the first time ever
text: The historic drop in long-term U.S. bond yields comes shortly after the closely-watched 10-year Treasury note and the 2-year inverted.

title: Saudi Arabia is dramatically changing its oil exports to China and the US. Here's what that means
text: The Saudis are using both short-term tactics and long-term strategy, industry experts say.

title: Carlsberg half-yearly sales rise 6.5%
text: Carlsberg  reported a 6.5% rise in half-year sales on Thursday, as the Danish brewer sold more expensive beer and its operating margins improved.

title: Go For Gold: Why Bullion Prices Could Keep Exploding Next Week
text: Gold's on the charge but there's plenty of scope for it to keep soaring. Could these events next week force bullion prices to new multi-year peaks?

title: Strategist: Yield curves predict 'absolutely nothing,' and central banks 'never run out of bullets'
text: Amid fears of a looming recession after an indicator flashed a warning signal, one strategist told CNBC that the inverted yield curve "predicts absolutely nothing."

title: Global stocks spooked, oil sinks as bond markets scream recession
text: Asian stocks slid and oil prices extended a punishing sell-off on Thursday as investors feared an historic drop in long-term U.S. bond yields could prove a herald of recession globally.
